dmca.title: Copyright Infringment -Tapesh.com - Caltex
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Mehrdad [mailto:mehrdad@caltexrecords.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, November 02, 2006 3:41 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringment -Tapesh.com - Caltex
Subject: Copyright Infringment -Tapesh.com - Caltex


To Whom It may Concern: 

www.tapesh.com is placing and offering our musical copyrighted materials
with no authorization from us. Therefore, we request their immediate
removal. 

1.        An electronic signature of the copyright owner, or a person
authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive copyright that
has allegedly been infringed. We hereby certify under we are the legal
owners of infringed musical compositions. If you require to have all
signed statement, please provide us your fax number, we will fax it to
you. 
2.        Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been
infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works on
that site. www.tapesh.com <http://www.tapesh.com>  offers hundreds of
our copyrighted sound-recordings and musical videos. Some links are as
follow: 

        
http://www.tapesh.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=8&Itemid
=15 once you click on an artist the player opens that shows no link

         

3.        Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing
or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or
access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient
to permit Go Daddy to locate the material. 

        
http://www.tapesh.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=8&Itemid
=15 once you click on an artist the player opens that shows no link

         

              
4.        Information reasonably sufficient to permit oftLayer to contact
the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the Complaining Party may
be contacted. 
        Mehrdad Pakravan
        Caltex Records
        9045-A Eton Avenue
        Canoga Park, CA 91304
        USA
        Tel: 818-700-8657
        Fax: 818-700-0285
        Email: mehrdad@caltexrecords.com
        www.caltexrecords.com
5.        A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

        I, Mehrdad Pakravan President of Caltex Records hereby testify
under penalty of perjury that Caltex Records is sole owner of the albums
/ sound recordings attached to this statement and 100% of copyright
ownership and publishing belongs to Caltex Records. We have not
authorized -      www.Persian4U.com <http://www.Persian4U.com>  

         to display, to promote, to solicit or to sell our copyrighted
sound recordings on the internet.

         Signed by:    Mehrdad Pakravan

6.        A statement that the information in the notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is
the owner, or is authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. All above information is
accurate and Caltex Records is the sole owner of the sound-recordings,
audio and video and we have all exclusive perpetual worldwide right.

I hope to have provided you all you need.
 
Best regards.
Mehrdad
